forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
